import './App.css'; import Navbar from './components/Navbar' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import Homepage from './components/Homepage'; import SignUp from './components/SignUp' import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { AuthProvider } from './contexts/AuthContext'; import LogIn from './components/LogIn' import ForgotPassword from './components/ForgotPassword'; import database from './components/data' function App() { return ( <>
); } export default App;
